source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts
source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.

items.title: Watercolor Painting Landscapes I By Award Winning Artist
items.headline: Paint Complete Landscape Scenes I Trees & Foliage I Sunset I Water Reflection I 4 Seasons: Winter Spring Summer & Autumn
objectives_summary: Paint complete landscape scenes
Paint branches and trees
Mix different colors with only 4 tubes of paint

items.title: Paint TREES in watercolor,easily. Video demos show you how.

visible_instructors.title: Nicola A Blakemore
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Artist, Teacher and Creative Entrepreneur
visible_instructors.name: Nicola A

items.headline: Paint trees in watercolor with confidence. Clear video demos show you how to paint a variety of trees, common & exotic.
objectives_summary: Learn SIMPLE and adaptable methods to paint a variety of trees in watercolour.
Understand how to get the shape and colours to create a BELIEVABLE tree.
Paint both deciduous and coniferous trees, some shrubs and climbers.

items.title: Digital Coloring: Comic Style Light & Shadow Made Easy!
items.headline: Render amazing highlights and shading with this step-by-step approach| From pro comic colorist K. Michael Russell
objectives_summary: Students will have a solid basis for rendering highlight and shadows.
Students will learn a simple, step-by-step that creates complex-looking results.
Students will learn an easily repeatable workflow for adding light and shadow.

items.title: Mixed media collage art made easy
items.headline: A step by step guide for any level
objectives_summary: Create artwork unique to their personal tastes.
Know all the steps to creating mixed media.
Have enough skills to work on their own after the class is done.

items.title: Brother ScanNCut SDX125
items.headline: Enhance your Crafting Skills
objectives_summary: You will be able to use your Brother ScanNCut SDX125 right out of the box.
You will be able to use the built-in patterns to create shapes, layers for cards and embellishments.
You will cut a variety of materials and be able to change the settings on the SDX125 as needed.

items.title: The Watercolor Painting Series - VERY BEGINNER'S GUIDE
items.headline: Learn the Fundamentals of Watercolor Painting - Art Theory, Color Theory, Trending topics, Illustrations and more.
objectives_summary: You will be able to paint easy watercolor paintings.
You will be able to use different color schemes, like monochrome, complementary and analogous.
You will be able to create a realistic effect in your artworks by applying the reverse shading method.

items.title: Painting Watercolors From Photographs The Easy Way
items.headline: Turn your photographs into lively watercolor paintings. Create light and atmosphere in easy steps using a simple palette
objectives_summary: At the end of this course you will be able to paint more confidentially using photographs as your reference
You will have a better understanding of compostion
You will have the skills to use value and color to create the feeling of light in your work

items.title: The Ultimate Photorealistic Drawing Course
items.headline: Learn how to bring your art to life
objectives_summary: You will learn the basics and fundamentals of drawing with colored pencils
You will learn how to blend colored pencils
You will learn how to layer colors

items.title: Draw & Paint Islamic Patterns: Eightfold Islamic Geometry
items.headline: Learn to construct, trace, transfer, tile & paint six compositions based on four patterns from around the Islamic world.
objectives_summary: Construct four different eightfold Islamic geometric patterns
Trace, transfer and tile the pattern to create a larger composition.
Create an interwoven effect.

items.title: Watercolor Paint Realistic Snowy Trees & Bushes

visible_instructors.title: Steve Curl
visible_instructors.name: Steve
visible_instructors.job_title: 2-Time Teacher Of The Year & Award-Winning Painter

items.headline: 100% Satisfaction Guarantee! Features a 2-time Teacher Of The Year and award-winning painter
objectives_summary: Study snowy trees to prepare for a painting.
Sketch realistic snowy trees without trees looking fake.
Draw and paint "negative space".

items.title: How to make sugar craft roses
items.headline: How to make gum paste and modelling paste rose flowers for cake decorators and artists.
objectives_summary: create a wired sugar craft rose
develop your skills and confidence

items.title: Sculpting Creatures and Critters
items.headline: Bringing Your Ideas to Life in Clay
objectives_summary: To learn the basics of form as they pertain to sculpture.
To gain the ability to sculpt an original figure from scratch.
To obtain the knowledge of materials used in sculpting character maquettes.

items.title: Acrylic Painting Techniques for Landscape Course

visible_instructors.title: Rod Moore
visible_instructors.job_title: Best Selling Instructor, Artist & Art Teacher
visible_instructors.name: Rod

items.headline: How to paint landscapes in Acrylic Paint. Learn these simple Acrylic Painting Techniques for Painting simple landscapes
objectives_summary: The basics of painting in acrylics which can also be applied to oil painting
How to paint 4 different styles of skies (essential to any landscape)
How to paint 4 different types of mountains including Bob Ross style mountains

items.title: Doodle Magic | Basic & Fun Techniques
items.headline: Learn how to make fun doodle art & level up your drawing skills!
objectives_summary: What is Doodling
Best Supplies for Doodling
How to Fix Mistakes

items.title: Pencil Drawing for Beginners
items.headline: Learn the basics of pencil techniques, that will allow you to draw and shade beautifully
objectives_summary: Draw basic lines and shapes using pencil, shade their drawings and begin drawing from observation

items.title: Exciting 7 Step Method to Abstract Painting
items.headline: Discover a Unique and Fun method to creating abstract art, using my 7 Step Approach.
objectives_summary: Create your own gorgeous abstract paintings, using my 7 Step Approach
